name: Gravitaz (itch)
description:
Gravitaz is a 2d Shmup inspired by classic arcade games. During development, more and more danmaku elements made their way into the game, leading to an neat mix of old and new. 

In case you want to check out the code, There's a video on it over on Youtube.

Features:

  • Six unique enemy types
  • Shop selling more firepower
  • We're pretty sure this game will run on a potato
